NamedQuery.query: SELECT rowNumber, id, packageName, packageUrl, packageHash, description, minVersion, maxVersion, typeName, providerName, about FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS rowNumber, id, packageName, packageUrl, packageHash, description, minVersion, maxVersion, typeName, providerName, about FROM public.PearlZipPackages p) tbl WHERE (SELECT id FROM dbo.PearlZipVersion WHERE Version = minVersion) >= (SELECT id FROM dbo.PearlZipVersion WHERE Version = :version) AND (SELECT id FROM dbo.PearlZipVersion WHERE Version = maxVersion) <= (SELECT id FROM dbo.PearlZipVersion WHERE Version = :version) AND rowNumber > CAST(:lowerBound AS INT) AND rowNumber <= CAST(:upperBound AS INT) ORDER BY id
